title: Multi-Assist
description: Developed an API-centric application leveraging AI/ML models within a microservice architecture to deliver personalized health advice and multilingual translations. Balanced this self-initiated project alongside team commitments, showcasing adaptability and efficiency.

title: Timetable
description: Designed and developed a faculty-student timetable app utilizing 15 AWS services, including API Gateway, Step Functions, and AWS RDS, to enable real-time scheduling and data synchronization. Automated CI/CD pipelines using AWS CodePipeline and CodeDeploy.

title: Linli-Match
description: Developed and optimized a neighborhood engagement engine using Python, React, CSS, and JavaScript for Webmainland Media Ltd. Improved system stability and refined the matching algorithm for accuracy and real-time efficiency.

title: AWDEA
description: Applied UX best practices to design and develop intuitive interfaces in AWDEA, enhancing accessibility and user satisfaction. Integrated AWS for hosting, MongoDB for data storage, and Stripe for payment processing.

title: Escheduler
description: Built a scalable platform using AWS Elastic Beanstalk with features like appointment booking, doctor recommendations, and patient history viewing. Implemented secure authentication and efficient email interactions.

title: AISleep
description: Developed a data-driven web application using Python and Graphic API for sleep trend analysis and insights. Collaborated in a 4-member team, managing tasks efficiently with Trello.

title: Ready Bee
description: An emergency preparedness web app that helps you build a custom first aid kit and securely store important documents. Balanced project work with five concurrent courses, solving challenges through collaboration and innovation.

title: Chess Game
description: Developed a classic chess game using JavaScript, showcasing expertise in game logic implementation and dynamic UI creation.

title: Snake Game
description: Created a snake game as a fun project to enhance problem-solving and improve programming skills.
